song.title: Call 1-800-DEMOSCENE
song.info:
2nd place in the 2016 Streaming Music compo at Revison.
A mostly complete attempt at lyrics: -------------------------------------- So your day has not been great so far. No seats left and all your entries are gone but your harddisk crashed. So you team up for an entry, it's quite a drunk assembly, that's what you get for using Commodore.
[So your day sucks? Doesn't matter. We gonna help you. Uh-huh.]
Call 1-800-DEMOSCENE, in between, and you'll get lucky. What can we say we love 4k C++, and salmiakki.
Call 1-800-DEMOSCENE, in between, and you'll get lucky. What can we say we love 4k C++, and salmiakki.
You can't concentrate so you walk outside for a drink or three by the fireplace you meet Abductee. The bonfire gets hotta. You pass out from vodka. Where is everyone to get the entry done.
[It don't matta. We gonna make your day. Uh-uh uh-uh.]
Call 1-800-DEMOSCENE, in between, and you'll get lucky. (ohhhh) What can we say we love 4k C++, and mystic Okkie.
Call 1-800-DEMOSCENE, in between, and you'll get lucky. (ohh ohhh oh ohhh)
We'll fix your file Amiga style (C++), and we got Okkie. (ohh ohhh oh ohhh)
[You don't need to be dealing with this shit alone. Ain't nobody got time for dat.]
You said you would rock the compo with your funky crew. Now your code and shaders are overdue. The deadline's coming closer you feel like a poser and you have no clue how to pull it through.
[[It's always been time to call us but sure as hell it is now.]]
You got your entry finished and entered after all. Now you wander mindlessly around the hall. But then there's an announcement your entry has bounced and Evilbot has replied: YOU'RE DISQUALIFIED.
[[Oh come on now you have to call us right?]]
Call 1-800-DEMOSCENE, in between, and you'll get lucky. (Lucky, lucky, lucky)
[Ain't nobody got time for dat.]
What can we say we love 4k C++, and salmiakki. (yakki, yakki)
Call 1-800-DEMOSCENE, in between, and you'll get lucky. We are you muses. (muses, muses)
Itsy bitsy teeny weeny ddt in a minikini. We've heard, enough excuses.
[You don't need to be dealing with this shit alone. We're in this together.]
(Ahhhhh, ahhhhh)
[We're in this together.]
[[Call 1-800-DEMOSCENE]]
[[Call 1-800-DEMOSCENE]]
[[[We're sorry the number you have dialed is not in service. Please check the number and try again]]]
